title:
Revisiting Lipid Nanoparticle Composition and Structure: A Critical Take
  on Simulation Approaches
authors: Marius F.W. Trollmann, Paolo Rossetti, and Rainer A. B\"ockmann
abstract:
Comment to article published in Proc. Natl. Acad. Sci. U. S. A.: Garaizar, A.
et al. 'Toward understanding lipid reorganization in RNA lipid nanoparticles in
acidic environments.' Proc. Natl. Acad. Sci. U. S. A. 121, e2404555121 (2024)
